document_data.mainbody:
Milo Dudley was the dwarven bartender of the Dragons Jaws tavern and inn in Suzail.
Milo was a friend to everyone who came through the doors. He was very observant and quick to notice anyone in need, offering to help in anyway he could, often before a patron even had recognized the need&mdashwhether it was simply a refill or something more serious like a need for a bodyguard.
